thread.section_title: Express Medical Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Express Medical Supply | www.exmed.net
thread.title: Mark
thread.title_full: Express Medical Supply reviewed by Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text:
I only bought one small item, but they handled it as if I was a major buyer. It was processed quickly, and packaged and shipped as you would expect, proper and timely. I'll be back, and highly recommend them for any and all products that I use.
Being able to use PayPal was so convenient!!
